name: Dangerous Territory
description:
You're missing pieces of your gun and you have no idea where you put them! You search and end up in a place where you don't want to be... at least your gun parts are there!

Collect gun pieces to increase bullets fired from your gun. You win when you collect 15 of them. 

A or D - Left, right

SPACE or W - Jump

LEFT ARROW or LEFT CLICK - Shoot

Sound effects from: https://www.zapsplat.com/

Made in 48 hours for Dani's Basement Jam #3 (started a day late)
